response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is truly a remarkable item with exceptional features and quality. Given its unique benefits, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $150 to many people. Considering its high value, I'm extending this exclusive opportunity to you at an introductory price of $200. This special offer allows you to experience the product's benefits at a premium rate, ensuring you receive the best value possible. Please let me know if you're interested in securing this deal.", "product_price": 200}
